text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @jasoninthehouse There are greater issues in the USA than your fear of investigations. Maybe instead of weak deflection you could help limit Coronavirus and finally speak towards Reaching Peace in the protests by Condemning Police Brutality instead of encouraging it.
